### Hi there üëã


-  I‚Äôm currently working with **Next.js** with **TypeScript**(Web), **React-Native**(Mobile), **Ruby**(USSD) and **Python**(AI development)
-  I‚Äôm also building fault tolerant backend projects in **Elixir** (API development).
-  I‚Äôm looking to collaborate on any Project regardless of my scope. I'm open to learn new stuff, bring them on!
- üì´ How to reach me: geraldaddey@yahoo.com
- üë®üèæ‚Äçüíº Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/geraldaddey/
